fields.value: State Legislative Election Returns, 1967-2016: Restructured For Use

dsDescriptionValue.value: Restructures the State Legislative Election Returns (1967-2016) dataset so that the contest is the unit of analysis.  The code that restructures the dataset is provided and a one hour video giving an overview of what the code does can be found at klarnerpolitics.org.

fields.value: If you want to run the code to produce the file posted here, you have to get the unstructured SLERs file from my post here with that file, and add the suffix "001_" to the file name.  The code with "usedforvideo" in the file name is the code I went through in the video, but I altered it somewhat for this file.  The code with the same prefix as the latter is what produced this file.

files.description: This file merely has state names and codes.
files.label: 000_StateCodes-1.tab

dataFile.description: This file merely has state names and codes.

files.description: This file merely contains the aggregate number of seats in each legislative chamber in each year.
files.label: 002From_StatePartisanBalance1777to2016_20171027_SourceFiles-1.tab

dataFile.description: This file merely contains the aggregate number of seats in each legislative chamber in each year.
